name: Cylinder Tracking
query:
SELECT
  COALESCE(rbr.roast_cylinder, rb.roast_cylinder)                           AS "Cylinder:Link/Roast Cylinder:140",
  rb.roast_date                                                             AS "Date:Date:105",
  rb.name                                                                   AS "Roast Batch:Link/Roast Batch:160",

  /* GREEN by Group */
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G1' THEN COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)  ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G1 (green):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G2' THEN COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)  ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G2 (green):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G3' THEN COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)  ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G3 (green):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)), 2)                                                AS "Sum (green):Float:100",

  /* ROASTED by Group */
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G1' THEN COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G1 (roasted):Float:105",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G2' THEN COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G2 (roasted):Float:105",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G3' THEN COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G3 (roasted):Float:105",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)), 2)                                               AS "Sum (roasted):Float:110",

  /* LOSS (green - roasted) */
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G1' THEN (COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G1 (loss):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G2' THEN (COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G2 (loss):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN rbr.bean_group='G3' THEN (COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)) ELSE 0 END), 2) AS "G3 (loss):Float:95",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.input_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)), 2)                                                       AS "Sum (loss):Float:100",

  /* Rejects & Net */
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.quacker,0)), 2)                                                                            AS "Quacker (kg):Float:90",
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rbr.output_qty,0)-COALESCE(rbr.quacker,0)), 2)                                                 AS "Net Coffee (kg):Float:110",

  rb.roasting_machine                                                                                               AS "Machine:Link/Roasting Machine:150",
  rb.operator                                                                                                       AS "Operator:Link/User:130"
FROM `tabRoast Batch` rb
LEFT JOIN `tabRoast Batch Round` rbr ON rbr.parent = rb.name
WHERE 1=1
  AND ( %(roast_cylinder)s  = '' OR COALESCE(rbr.roast_cylinder, rb.roast_cylinder) = %(roast_cylinder)s )
  AND ( %(from_date)s        = '' OR rb.roast_date >= %(from_date)s )
  AND ( %(to_date)s          = '' OR rb.roast_date <= %(to_date)s )
  AND ( %(roasting_machine)s = '' OR rb.roasting_machine = %(roasting_machine)s )
  AND ( %(operator)s         = '' OR rb.operator = %(operator)s )
GROUP BY
  COALESCE(rbr.roast_cylinder, rb.roast_cylinder),
  rb.roast_date,
  rb.name,
  rb.roasting_machine,
  rb.operator
ORDER BY rb.roast_date DESC, rb.name DESC;
